heading: Today
text: Patchy fog early. Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered snow showers this morning, mainly in the mountains. Highs from the upper 30s to mid 40s south and in the Champlain Valley, and mid 30s to around 40 elsewhere north, with some lower 30s northeast. Winds becoming northwest 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mainly clear early, then clouds increasing. Lows from the mid 20s to lower 30s, some lower 20s northeast. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of late-day rain showers in areas south and west of Interstate 89. Highs from the upper 30s to mid 40s. Winds becoming south 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.
